content.question: Some art historians have interpreted Sandro Botticelli’s Birth of Venus as reflecting the artist’s interest in which of the following?

choices.label: Scientific advancements that were achieved during the Renaissance
Neoplatonic ideals that suggest divine love can be understood through beauty
The use of classical mythology to attract new converts to Catholicism
The Florentine government’s relationship with powerful mercantile families

content.answer: Neoplatonic ideals that suggest divine love can be understood through beauty

unit.text: 3: Early Europe and Colonial Americas, 200 - 1750 CE

topic.text: 3.5: Theories and Interpretations of Early European and Colonial American Art

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Describe one or more art historically relevant interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art), its reception, or its meaning.
